welcome.mainTitle: Your Gateway to a Meaningful Relationship
welcome.subtitle: Investing a few minutes in our introductory questionnaire is your first and most important step on the journey to finding a real, deep, and precise connection.

loginPrompt.title: Important to know:
loginPrompt.text: To ensure your investment isn't lost, we recommend logging in. This way, we can save your progress, and you can return to complete the questionnaire at any time.

features.title: A Personalized Journey
features.description: The questionnaire is divided into content worlds, allowing you to progress at your own pace, with understanding and respect for your time.

features.title: Your Privacy - A Top Priority
features.description: Your answers are completely discreet and are used only by our experienced matchmaking team for the purpose of finding you a match.

features.title: Beyond the Algorithm
features.description: Behind every match is a real matchmaker who knows your story. We combine technology with human wisdom.

quotes.quote: For the first time, I felt they were really trying to understand who I am, not just check a box on a list.
quotes.author: Jonathan, 34

quotes.quote: The process was serious, respectful, and gave me new insights about myself and what I'm looking for.
quotes.author: Michal, 29

finalCta.title: Ready to take your first step?

worldIntro.whyTitle: Why is This World Crucial for Your Success?
worldIntro.whatYouWillDiscoverTitle: What Will You Discover About Yourself?

PERSONALITY.title: The World of Personality
PERSONALITY.subtitle: Who am I really?
PERSONALITY.whyIsItImportant: A deep understanding of who you are is the foundation of any healthy relationship. Here, you'll have the opportunity to present yourself authentically, so we can find someone who will fall in love with the real you.
whatYouWillDiscover: What are the driving forces in your life
Your communication style and social interaction
How you deal with challenges and make decisions
PERSONALITY.guidingThought: The beauty of a relationship is not finding someone perfect, but finding someone whose parts complete yours.

VALUES.title: The World of Values
VALUES.subtitle: What truly motivates you?
VALUES.whyIsItImportant: Shared values are the backbone of a stable and happy relationship. In this world, we will help you distill your core principles to build a solid foundation for your future shared home.
whatYouWillDiscover: Your priorities between family, career, and spirituality
Your approach to money, giving, and personal growth
What community and social environment suit you
VALUES.guidingThought: When your values meet, the shared path becomes clearer and easier.

RELATIONSHIP.title: The World of Partnership
RELATIONSHIP.subtitle: What does your ideal partnership look like?
RELATIONSHIP.whyIsItImportant: A good relationship is a partnership. Here, we will understand your expectations from a relationship, your 'love languages', and how you envision shared daily life. This is the key to creating a connection based on understanding, respect, and true friendship.
whatYouWillDiscover: The essence of a healthy relationship in your eyes
The right balance for you between 'together' and 'apart'
RELATIONSHIP.guidingThought: The question is not 'Will you be happy?', but 'How will you cope together when you are less happy?'.

PARTNER.title: The World of the Partner
PARTNER.subtitle: Who will you choose?
PARTNER.whyIsItImportant: Defining the ideal partner is more than a list of traits; it's an understanding of what you truly need to flourish. Here, we will focus the search and understand what is non-negotiable for you.
whatYouWillDiscover: Which character traits are most essential for you
Your preferences regarding lifestyle and background
What your 'red lines' are in a relationship
PARTNER.guidingThought: Don't look for the person you can live with, look for the person you can't live without.

RELIGION.title: Religion and Tradition
RELIGION.subtitle: Faith and Halacha in your life
RELIGION.whyIsItImportant: The spiritual and religious world is a fundamental layer in building a faithful home in Israel. In this world, we will understand your personal connection, your outlook, and your vision for a Jewish home. This is a necessary basis for marital harmony and raising children.
whatYouWillDiscover: Your personal definition on the religious spectrum
How Halacha and tradition are expressed in your life
Your vision for religious and spiritual education in the family
RELIGION.guidingThought: A Jewish home is built not only of bricks, but also of prayers, values, and tradition passed down from generation to generation.

depthDescriptions.BASIC: Mandatory questions that form the basis for getting acquainted
depthDescriptions.ADVANCED: Recommended questions for a deeper acquaintance
depthDescriptions.EXPERT: Enrichment questions for a particularly deep connection

hero.title: Your Path to a Meaningful Relationship
hero.subtitle: Investing a few minutes in our in-depth questionnaire is the most important step in building your accurate profile. A profile that will allow us, the matchmaking team, to find you a real, well-founded, and deep match.

worldsSection.title: Five Worlds, One Accurate Profile
worldsSection.subtitle: The questionnaire is divided into five content worlds. Each world focuses on a different aspect of your personality and expectations, and together they create a complete and rich picture that will serve us in the matching process.

PERSONALITY.title: World of Personality
PERSONALITY.description: Here you will paint an authentic picture of your personality, so we can deeply understand who you are.

VALUES.title: World of Values
VALUES.description: What are the pillars of your life? Here we will define the values and beliefs that guide you.

RELATIONSHIP.title: World of Partnership
RELATIONSHIP.description: What is a relationship for you? Here you will detail your expectations from the connection and your vision for partnership.

PARTNER.title: World of the Partner
PARTNER.description: Who are you looking for? Here we will focus the search and understand what is essential for you in a partner.

RELIGION.title: Religion & Tradition
RELIGION.description: What is your connection to Judaism? Here you will detail your religious identity and its expression in your life.

featuresSection.title: The Foundation for Your Success
featuresSection.subtitle: We have invested much thought and experience to make the process as efficient, respectful, and accurate as possible.

features.title: Guided and Flexible Process
features.description: The questionnaire is divided into separate worlds, so you can fill it out at your own pace, stop, and return at any stage.

features.title: Absolute Privacy
features.description: Your answers are completely discreet and are used only by our professional matchmaking team for the purpose of finding the most accurate match.

features.title: Proven Methodology
features.description: Our method combines insights from psychology with the experience of veteran matchmakers to create deep matches, not just superficial ones.

finalCta.title: Ready to Build Your Profile?
finalCta.subtitle: The first step is to provide us with your complete and authentic picture. From here, our expertise and technology come into play to start the precise search for you.

profileNotice.textPart2: toggle at the bottom of each question.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about the questionnaire and matching process
faq.emptyState: No questions found matching your search

save-progress.question: Can I save my progress and continue later?

answer.content: Yes, the system automatically saves your progress in the questionnaire. You can return at any time and continue where you left off.

answer.title: Tip:
answer.content: Every time you move to another world or finish a world, the system automatically saves your progress.

time-to-complete.question: How long does it take to complete the questionnaire?

answer.content: The entire questionnaire takes about 30-40 minutes, but you don't need to fill it all out at once. You can complete it in parts. Each world takes about 5-10 minutes.

required-questions.question: Is it mandatory to answer all questions?

answer.content: No, only questions marked with 'Required *' must be answered. These questions are essential for creating a basic matching profile.
However, the more questions you answer, the better we can find a match for you.

how-matching-works.question: How does the matching process work?

answer.content: The matching process is based on several steps:

content: Filling out the questionnaire and creating a personality and values profile
Analysis of the answers by a professional team and a computer algorithm
Identifying potential matches based on numerous criteria
Presenting top matches to both parties
In case of mutual agreement, facilitating initial contact

answer.content: Your information is kept completely confidential. Only our professional matching team can see your full answers, and only for the purpose of creating matches.
When a potential match is presented, the other party only sees general details and common interests, not all your answers.

edit-answers.question: Can I edit my answers after I'm done?

answer.content: Yes, you can always go back and edit your answers. Simply access the questionnaire through your personal profile and select the world you wish to edit. Changing your answers may affect your future matches.

match-percentage.question: How is the match percentage calculated?

answer.content: The match percentage is calculated based on a variety of parameters:

content: Compatibility in core values and beliefs
Expectations from family life and partnership

answer.content: A high match percentage indicates good potential for a meaningful relationship, but remember that personal chemistry and an in-person meeting are always the real test!

incomplete-questionnaire.question: What happens if I don't complete the entire questionnaire?

answer.content: You can start receiving matches even if you haven't completed all the worlds in the questionnaire, provided you have answered the required questions and enough questions to create a basic profile.
However, the more questions you complete, the more accurate the matches you receive will be. It is recommended to complete all questions gradually.

inactive-account.question: What happens if I'm inactive for an extended period?

answer.content: If your account is inactive for 3 months, we will send you an email notification. After 6 months of inactivity, your profile will be set to inactive and will not be shown in new matches. You can always reactivate it by logging into your account.
